      About

      Birzeit University first offered a teacher education program in the 1970s. At that time it was called a teaching certificate program. It was the first Palestinian university to offer such a program.

###  About
Birzeit University first offered a teacher education program in the 1970s. At that time it was called a teaching certificate program. It was the first Palestinian university to offer such a program.

###  About
Birzeit University first offered a teacher education program in the 1970s. At that time it was called a teaching certificate program. It was the first Palestinian university to offer such a program.

###  About
Birzeit University first offered a teacher education program in the 1970s. At that time it was called a teaching certificate program. It was the first Palestinian university to offer such a program.
